OrgName.entry: SALVATION ARMY, THE - SHEFFIELD CITADEL CORPS (PSALTER LANE)

Desc.entry: Christian church, social and organisation. A registered charity.

DisabledAccess.entry: Induction Loop main hall only, lift access from underground car park .

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8.30am-5pm (office hours); Sunday Services at 9.45am (prayer meeting), 10.30am (morning meeting), 11.15am (children's service), 12noon (open-air outreach), 6pm (evening meeting)
